channel.title: How to get/use silab client with no errors
channel.description:
Step 1:Go on to the website: if you have winrar: [URL=http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.rar]http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.rar[/URL] if you have winzip: [URL=http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.zip]http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.zip[/URL]
Step 2:Once you have type that in you will get a box like this [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img410.imageshack.us/img410/1841/client1zu2.png[/img][/URL]
Step 3:[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img410.imageshack.us/img410/3936/client2kh5.png[/img][/URL]
Step 4:Save it to your desktop
Step 5: Right click and click extract here [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img79.imageshack.us/img79/683/client3fd3.png[/img][/URL]
Step 6: Two icons will appear [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img79.imageshack.us/img79/728/client4yt0.png[/img][/URL]
Step 7: Double click on run and the client will appear with another window [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/6274/client5hv9.png[/img][/URL] and [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/2012/client6ew4.png[/img][/URL]
Step 8: Click Existing user [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img410.imageshack.us/img410/7619/client8wx3.png[/img][/URL]
Step 9:type your username and password in the place provided then in server ip: put rileyscape.no-ip.org in server port type:43594 (it should already be there) [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img79.imageshack.us/img79/6233/client7tb4.png[/img][/URL]
Hope it helps you.
Here is the list of items and the id's of each item: [URL=http://dnd.no-ip.org/output.txt]http://dnd.no-ip.org/output.txt[/URL]
Please post your feed back.

@barrage_time wrote:

Step 1:Go on to the website:
if you have winrar: http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.rar
if you have winzip: http://dnd.no-ip.org/Version3.zip

Step 2:Once you have type that in you will get a box like this

Step 3:

Step 4:Save it to your desktop

Step 5: Right click and click extract here

Step 6: Two icons will appear

Step 7: Double click on run and the client will appear with another window

and

Step 8: Click Existing user

Step 9:type your username and password in the place provided
then in server ip: put rileyscape.no-ip.org
in server port type:43594 (it should already be there)

Hope it helps you.
